name: titillatingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
using sexual images or descriptions, etc. that intentionally cause excitement, but not in a serious way: The play contains some titillatingly realistic depictions of sexual acts. She kept crossing and uncrossing her legs in a titillatingly flirtatious way.
humorous in an interesting and shocking way: The headline titillatingly suggests that the article contains the answer to a mystery that has puzzled historians for centuries. The voice-over titillatingly describes the boat as passing through "shark-infested waters".
More examplesFewer examplesShe came on stage titillatingly dressed in only a bra and hot pants.The play titillatingly examines sexual relations in the twenty-first century.The exhibition is titillatingly entitled "My Naked Body".This article titillatingly talks about the discovery of a new species in Loch Ness.
